function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Unclear mechanisms for generating well-being or poor health","Impact":"Difficulty in addressing health inequalities and contagion","Mitigation":"Conducting more research to specify the mechanisms","Technologies":"Research methods for identifying mechanisms","People":"Tenants, residents, individuals in social inequality","Owner":"Research organizations, public health institutions"},{"Description":"Correlation mistaken for causation","Impact":"Misguided interventions and policies","Mitigation":"Emphasizing the need for further research to establish causation","Technologies":"Advanced statistical and research methods","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, academic experts"}]}
